Reviews.Title: First SLR!!
Reviews.Author: Julie
Reviews.Content: This is my first SLR and so far I love it.  I love the weight of it - extremely light.  At first it felt bulky compared to a point & click but I am getting used to it.  There's alot to learn now with lenses and settings that I have been searching for classes with no luck.  So for now, alot of trial and error shots - thank goodness it's digital. This kit has everything but the camera bag is way too small if you plan to carry all your lenses, filters, mini tripod, batteries, charger and book with the camera at all times.  The flip view screen is a feature I think I'll have on every camera now. Definitely recommend a T3i kit as it takes the guess work out of knowing what you'll need!!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera and lens combo
Reviews.Author: Scrapbamy
Reviews.Content: This is a great package. We did a lot of research before we purchased and we are very pleased with what we received. The tripod is junk, but we suspected that beforehand. Otherwise it is a great combination of lenses, batteries, memory and other accessories. This camera takes amazing pictures!!!

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: J.O.G.
Reviews.Content: I'm happy with this purchase.  The 18 mega pixels will allow shots to be blown up as large as I want.

Reviews.Title: Awesome package.
Reviews.Author: Disintegrator
Reviews.Content: This is the first DSLR that I have owned but I work with a Canon EOS 7D at work. Pictures and video are literally EXACTLY the same. This camera is half, or less than half the price of a 7D! There are some things that make this camera feel more comfortable for the family like auto settings. My wife loves those. It is lightweight, not the magnesium casing that the 7D has. The extra batteries that came with this package are fantastic. The tripod is crap but cool for the kids. Now, the macro/wide angle attachment is also pretty fun to play with. All in all, I have absolutely no regrets in purchasing this package!  Visit youtube and type in bookdeadsilence in the search box to see awesome videos of flowers and children playing, all shot with the T3i.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera and kit!
Reviews.Author: Jenner85
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera and an awesome kit! If this is your first SLR purchase or your 5th, this kit really does include it all (or at least a very hefty portion of it).My one and only complaint about the kit is the camera bag itself. I can't even fit the camera and a lens in the case let alone anything else! Kind of disappointed that I now how to go out and buy another bag. But all in all, considering the cost and what comes with it, this is a great bundle and a great seller! Shipping was EXTREMELY quick. I ordered on a Monday (mid morning) and the package arrived Tuesday! It was amazing!Thank you!

Reviews.Title: The Best Camera ever
Reviews.Author: Roger Kaput
Reviews.Content: Best camera on the market. Way more features than most of us will ever use, but fun to experimemt with.  Great quality, great creativity is possible and very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: First Time DSLR Buyer
Reviews.Author: Voitek Klimczyk "Lex"
Reviews.Content: I'm new to DSLR's and I purchased the Canon Rebel T3i because of it's 1080p video capabilities because I have a YouTube Channel where I post a lot of How-to Tutorials for Cars, Computers, and DIY Around The House Stuff.[...]Anyways, the Camera is amazing, although you will have to do a little bit of reading to figure out some of the more technical features. The good news is that you can set this thin on auto and you'll take excellent photos and excellent videos just like that. The more advanced features allow you to tweak your photos and videos, such as adjusting brightness, focus, blurring of background obkjects, and the speed of the shutter. I'm still very much a newbie with DSLR's but I have to admit that I fell in love with the camera and became a bit of a shutter bug as well. I think anyone that gets a camera like this will soon be filling up their hard drives before they know it. I actuall have to order a new hard drive as I'm writing this.Words of Advice:If you are looking for a camera that does photo and video very well = Get This!The only negative is that this camera doesn't do auto focus very well while in video, you have to hold the shutter button when you want to re-focus the camera on another object or scene. I also had some problems with noise in low lighting but, that's where the pro settings come in handy as well as the right lens. I seen videos on youtube with people making amazing quality movies with this exact camera, so I know it's just user error :PGreat camera and the kit has everything you need to really get started. If you bought a bare bones camera you would find yourself buying most of the items in the kit anyway. The items in the kit are all good, but the best items in it are the 2 real Canon lenses & the memory card. I have not really used the other lenses or filters. The Tripod is okay, but I believe if you spend the money on a really high quality tripod it would function much better than this one.Get the Camera; you will love it!

Reviews.Title: Rebel T3i Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: papa
Reviews.Content: We absolutly love this camera and use it all the time both for professional pictures for our buisness and for personal use.  Love it!

Reviews.Title: canon rebel T3I
Reviews.Author: renee
Reviews.Content: We love this camera and extras as we have 2 grandbabies that are 15 months old we took it to Jamaica this week & we took lots of amazing pictures. We would recomend this camera to anyone!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Starlight
Reviews.Content: I wish it came with instructions.  I'm a beginner and have had this camera for over a year.  It didn't come with any written instructions on how to use it.  I guess they just thought everyone would know.  youtube has good video's on how to use it, so I am watching those.  Takes very nice pictures. But I am still confused with all the stuff.

Reviews.Title: Nice package of lenses and accessories
Reviews.Author: Neil
Reviews.Content: The package of the lenses and accessories is almost everything you need to start taking great pictures. The tripod is of poor quality however so you will need to get a better one down the road.

Reviews.Title: All you need
Reviews.Author: sugam
Reviews.Content: On-time arrival! This kit includes everything you need to learn basic photography including some which you really don't need. Ultimate photo machine!

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: CJ
Reviews.Content: I am thrilled with this camera. It is easy to use and makes photos I take look professional! Although I have not used everything that came in the kit yet, I am looking forward to trying everything. The camera case doesn't hold everything in the kit, but I like the size for carrying the body, a lens and a few extras when I only want to take some of the kit and not everything!

Reviews.Title: best thing i have ever bought.
Reviews.Author: miss.texas
Reviews.Content: this camera is a great starter kit, i have never used a fancy shmansy camera before but had such a passion for photography, so i decided to get this & see what im made of, & this things great, it practically does all the work for me.macro setting isnt as good as my little compact camera, but that doesnt bother me because i just switch off between the two.makes your photos look so professional & well done.the quality is amazing on this camera, I just couldnt believe it.

Reviews.Title: Canon Rebel t3i
Reviews.Author: Selina Licona
Reviews.Content: i recieved the product with a scratch on the screen. I was upset and as soon as I connected the charger it burned out an outlet.

Reviews.Title: Could be better
Reviews.Author: Frederyck
Reviews.Content: The camera bag it's too small for T3i and the Tripod also too thin for this camera, the other parts works fine

Reviews.Title: Camera Kit
Reviews.Author: Edward J. Nelson
Reviews.Content: Kit appears to be a come-on as the camera bag is to small with the lens on the camera it just wont fit. The camera is a beauty which was as I expected but the tripod is way to small for a camera this heavy. The extra lenses are poor quality screw on lensesthat will not help the great canon lenses so those are money wasted. This is a over priced kit due to the quality of the added items all from China and should not be sold as components with a camera and lenses of this quality. I am sorry I purchased the kit but I did think I was getting a good deal for the money but now am not pleased. Ed Nelson

Reviews.Title: The purchase of the year!
Reviews.Author: dstandby
Reviews.Content: This set is impresive. It came with 2 targets and tons of other accessories, just as described by the seller. The most amazing thing was the price the put on all that stuff!. This was without a doubt my purchase of the year.

Reviews.Title: Great kit
Reviews.Author: Jim H
Reviews.Content: The kit has everything to get you started in photography. The price is better than I have found because most of the items are free because the price is basically paying for the camera. It is a good deal and it was shipped very fast and accurate.

Reviews.Title: great buy, love the camera!
Reviews.Author: Robert T. Boyd
Reviews.Content: This is a great slr with lots of extra features. It exceeds my expectations. Excellent value with all the extras in the bonus package. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Wonderful bundle!!!
Reviews.Author: Mrs. Mitchell "Live4Love"
Reviews.Content: This bundle is more than I'll probably ever need though I'm glad I have it. Plus I saved a bunch of money buying the bundle instead of purchasing the items separately. The camera itself is AMAZING. The additional batteries and chargers are wonderful and cost lots of $$$ if you purchase alone. I recently used the bigger tripod for the first time doing family photos for Christmas. All I can say is WOW. It made it so easy and I got professional pictures! Love it. Have not used the small tripod and I don't think I will. The bag it comes with is junk but I'll buy a more compatible bag for my needs anyway. This bundle comes with everything you need and more to get you started with your new camera!

Reviews.Title: Cannon T3i review
Reviews.Author: Arturo Emmanuel Salas García
Reviews.Content: It's an amazing camera. Just meet my expectations and even more. The package it's a real deal.I recommend it to everyone that is getting into photography.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: josue
Reviews.Content: muy buena camara se la compre a mi hija de cumpleanos y esta encantada, si recomiendo este kit 100 %

Reviews.Title: Great Product - Exactly what they said was included
Reviews.Author: JCarlson
Reviews.Content: Very good condition - everything was as it was advertised and we are very happy with the kit.  It takes beautiful shots and the whole family is very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: great package
Reviews.Author: Hub1100
Reviews.Content: awesome way to get ack into the hobby. until this package the AE-1 black body was my workhorse. very happy.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Donald F. Enzweiler
Reviews.Content: the camera is a great deal with all the extras that you get, the lenses are good not the best but for the price you are not going to do any better. If you want a good camera and a great price this is the one for you. The bag is a little to small for everything you get.

Reviews.Title: Digital package is great!
Reviews.Author: H. Barringer
Reviews.Content: I love this camera and the video. I would recommend this camera. Great pictures and good quality videoEven in low light room.

Reviews.Title: A real "professional" camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Buyer "Internet compulsive purchaser"
Reviews.Content: This is not only a wonderful camera, but also a great video recorder.  It comes with every lens u cd possibly need and everything u cd use.  Just 2 problems.  One, if u r not familiar with fancy cameras, u need to get lessons.  Secondly, the camera and accessories DO NOT fit into carrying case.  You need to buy a backpack type case just for that purpose.  Also, be warned if u r using the small case that comes with it and decide to just take camera with u one day, it may very well fall out.  So beware.  But if u want to take up photography, this is the camera to get.  Taking my first pics with auto setting were gorgeous .. Clear, correct coloring, etc.  just need more time to go for more lessons (or I cd read  the manual or watch to the DVD.)

Reviews.Title: Canon Camera
Reviews.Author: Grammy T
Reviews.Content: Great camera, took some excellent pictures on my cruise to the Mediterranean. The only problem is that it is rather complicated to use all the extra special features.  I will keep reading and practicing and hopefully will eventually be able to use the camera to its fullest potential.

Reviews.Title: Replacemant of stolen T3
Reviews.Author: Ray Heston "Hesstx"
Reviews.Content: We recently were broken into and had all our cameras, witch were mostly Canons taken.  I realy hated loseing the T3  but found this kit witch was about the same $$ as I had spent fot the T3 and 2 lenses.I was a bit concerned over the neg raters about the quality  here is what I feelThe camera and lenses are all new Canons no referbs.The Tipod is cheap but is functinable if you dont extend the legs all the way.The bag is just way small but I had a big Lowpro.The kit was sent fast and the staff at 6ave would answer all my ?s mostly the same dayYes there are some cheaper items but just buy the upgrades it you dont like what is there  over all a very good kit for me

Reviews.Title: good value for the money
Reviews.Author: ronald55
Reviews.Content: I purchase this camera two months ago, very pleased ,great camera,great value, great service,the only problem I have is with the bag, it is really a joke,you can add another $50-60 and send a decent bag or do not include a bag.Very happy with my Amazon purchase.

Reviews.Title: Good deal & good quality
Reviews.Author: Teresa
Reviews.Content: Hi everyone, well I purchased this camera to use if for my photo class in college. I being using it for two weeks and I can say that I like it a lot. While the delivery the lens fluid spelt a little bit but it was well protected inside a Ziploc bag so it did not damage other items. I sent an email to the seller and he fixed the problem by sending me a new box in which contained the liquid and other accessories that were in side of the same box from the previous one.  By my experience shopping online other sellers when you tell them that you are not happy with what you got they just say they are sorry and won't fix your problem or you would have to call them a lot. Over all I got the entire package and instead of getting two batteries for the camera I got three. I am happy with the results and recommend this product and trust the seller.

Reviews.Title: Broken tripod
Reviews.Author: Camera
Reviews.Content: The camera package was good except the tripod which was found broken in the package. I placed the complain but no response. I paid a lot of money for the package but I got a broken tripod!

ProductInfo.Features:
18.0 MP CMOS sensor and DIGIC 4 Image Processor for high image quality and speed.
ISO 100 - 6400 for shooting from bright to dim light.
Improved EOS Full HD Movie mode with manual exposure control, expanded recording with new Movie Digital zoom
3.0-inch Vari-Angle Clear View LCD; Built-in flash; Full HD movie mode at 1920 x 1080 resolution
Compatible with full line of Canon EF and EF-S lenses
ProductInfo.Name: Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera and DIGIC 4 Imaging with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Lens & Canon 55-250IS Lens + 58mm 2x Telephoto lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens (4 Lens Kit!!!!!!) W/32GB SDHC Memory+ 2 Extra Batteries + Charger + 3 Piece Filter Kit + UV Filter + Full Size Tripod + Case +Accessory Bundle!
